net.sf.openrds
Interface INodeEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeEventAdaptor
public interface INodeEventListener

Interface for listening to node events.

Since:
OpenRDS 0.4
Author:
Rodrigo
See Also:
INode.addNodeEventListener(INodeEventListener), INode.removeNodeEventListener(INodeEventListener)

Method Summary
 void nodeFinished(INode node)
          Called when a node is finished.
Works for both IMainNode and IProcessNode
 void nodeLostConnection(INode node)
          Called when a communication failure with the main node is detected.
Works only for IProcessNode
 void nodeRegistered(IMainNode mainNode, IProcessNode registeredNode)
          Called when a process node is added to main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode
 void nodeRequisitionFailed(INode node, Requisition requisition, java.lang.Throwable error)
          Called when a node fails to process a requisition.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()
 void nodeRequisitionProcessed(INode node, Requisition requisition, java.lang.Object result)
          Called when a node finishs processing a requisition with success.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()
 void nodeRestoredConnection(INode node)
          Called when the connection with the main node is restored.
Works only for IProcessNode
 void nodeUnregistered(IMainNode mainNode, IProcessNode unregisteredNode)
          Called when a process node is removed from main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode
 

Method Detail

nodeFinished

public void nodeFinished(INode node)
Called when a node is finished.
Works for both IMainNode and IProcessNode

Parameters:
node - node that generated this event

nodeRequisitionProcessed

public void nodeRequisitionProcessed(INode node,
                                     Requisition requisition,
                                     java.lang.Object result)
Called when a node finishs processing a requisition with success.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()

Parameters:
node - node that generated this event
requisition - requisition that has been processed
result - requisition result

nodeRequisitionFailed

public void nodeRequisitionFailed(INode node,
                                  Requisition requisition,
                                  java.lang.Throwable error)
Called when a node fails to process a requisition.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()

Parameters:
node - node that generated this event
requisition - requisition that has been processed
error - error detected during processing

nodeLostConnection

public void nodeLostConnection(INode node)
Called when a communication failure with the main node is detected.
Works only for IProcessNode

Parameters:
node - node that generated this event

nodeRestoredConnection

public void nodeRestoredConnection(INode node)
Called when the connection with the main node is restored.
Works only for IProcessNode

Parameters:
node - node that generated this event

nodeRegistered

public void nodeRegistered(IMainNode mainNode,
                           IProcessNode registeredNode)
Called when a process node is added to main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode

Parameters:
mainNode - main node that generated this event
registeredNode - node that has been added to control

nodeUnregistered

public void nodeUnregistered(IMainNode mainNode,
                             IProcessNode unregisteredNode)
Called when a process node is removed from main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode

Parameters:
mainNode - main node that generated this event
unregisteredNode - node that has been removed from control
